incomeTracker.title: Income Tracker
incomeTracker.subtitle: Track your actual and expected income below.

hero.subtitle: Cashvelo turns your income into simple envelopes, gives you crystal clear insights, and helps you stay consistent without spreadsheets or stress.

home.description: Cashvelo uses the cash envelope system, a visual method for setting limits, tracking spending, and keeping momentum month to month.

how.title: How Cashvelo keeps you on track
how.subtitle: Three steps. Minutes to set up. Habits that last.

step1.title: Create smart envelopes
step1.body: Assign money to categories you actually use. We guide your splits based on goals and a typical month.

step2.title: Track without friction
step2.body: Log spending in seconds, import bank CSVs, and let rules auto tag transactions.

step3.title: Protect your plan
step3.body: See safe to spend at a glance, get nudges before you overshoot, and roll leftovers to savings.

goals.title: Goals that feel doable
goals.copy: Targets for travel, emergency fund, or debt payoff broken into weekly bites.

fast.title: Delightfully fast
fast.copy: Zero lag UI and offline first so your budget is ready the moment you open the app.

private.title: Private by design
private.copy: Your data stays on your device with optional encrypted backup. No selling data.

reminders.title: Gentle reminders
reminders.copy: Notifications arrive at the right moment, after a purchase or before a bill.

why.title: Why people stick with Cashvelo
why.item1: Visual envelope system that clicks instantly
why.item2: Clear safe to spend so decisions feel easy
why.item3: Rollovers keep momentum month to month
why.item4: Works great solo or with a partner
